data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for The Board Meeting Held On January 17, 2022
data.news_body:
KP Energy Limited has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. January 17, 2022, inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021 (Q3FY22) and declared the Second interim dividend at 2.5% i.e. Re. 0.25 per equity share.

The outcome of the meeting is attached herewith.
